Fall_River.Simcock House (Swansea, Massachusetts): The Simcock House is a historic house at 1074 Sharps Lot Road in Swansea, Massachusetts. Construction of this 2-1/2 story vernacular Georgian house is estimated to have been around 1765; little is known of its history before the 19th century. It is architecturally unusual, with three asymmetrically placed bays and a large central chimney.
